summary: This document appears to be a financial statement from J.P. Morgan for an account associated with Epstein, detailing account summaries and client service contacts. It includes names of individuals involved in client services and account management.

keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from J.P. Morgan for the period of July 1, 2013, to July 31, 2013.
It includes contact information for various staff members associated with client services and investment management.
The statement is associated with an account under the name Epstein, although the name is not explicitly mentioned in the text.
